name: Pachinko Mountain
description:
Made in 48 hours, the theme of this jam was "Connection" and our styles were Chance, Physic-Based and Versus

Win points by climbing to the top of Pachinko Mountain faster than your friends! Once at the top, Throw Boulders to stop your friends advance.

You can play with up to 4 players, keyboard and/or controller.

Controls:

WASD / Left JoyStick = Move / Swing
Space / A = Jump / Grapple

This game was made by :
- Maxime Simard
- Julien Bilodeau
- Guillaume Lamontagne Morin
- Jean-Christophe Temblay
- Charles Renaud
- Simon Belley
